overview: Zong, a Chinese-American man, stumbles upon the possibility of using Nameer to "steal stuff" to do a webcast, but Namer doesn't know anything about the live broadcast. As the live-streaming plans get crazier, Ah Zong's girlfriend, Jane, gets involved. In Jane's conversations and memories with Arzon's ex-girlfriend, Wendy, the mystery is being revealed, and Namil must make a final decision.
title: View
